## ContractEvents.removeAllListeners() method

Remove all listeners on this contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeAllListeners(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

Remove all listeners from a contract

## Example


```javascript
contract.events.removeAllListeners();
```
